LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.0.des: We have been here for too long. Perhaps it is time to leave.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.1.des: We have been here for too long. Perhaps it is time to leave.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.2.des: We have been here for too long. Perhaps it is time to leave.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.3.des: This colony is trite. We should we wandering, not staying on the same place.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.4.des: This colony is trite. We should we wandering, not staying on the same place.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.5.des: Enough already! It is time to pack our things and hit the road.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.6.des: Enough already! It is time to pack our things and hit the road.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.7.des: Agh! I can't stand being here anymore!
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.0.desc: Our city is magnificent, a fine example of what humanity can achieve.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.1.desc: We have so many beautiful buildings!
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.2.desc: We have so many beautiful buildings!
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.4.desc: There are not enough buildings nearby. I feel unprotected.
